doc.field: Record Group 5. Fieldston Lower (1933-2012; 6.5 linear feet)
Record Group 5. Fieldston Lower (1933-2012; 6.5 linear feet)

This record group contains materials related to the Fieldston Lower School, the elementary school on the Fieldston campus. The bulk of materials are related to curriculum and student activities, or the day-to-day activities of the faculty and administration. Substantial information can be found in the 1985 report on Fieldston Lower by the New York Association of Independent Schools, and in annual department reports. Types of items include correspondence, ephemera, reports, teacher instruction materials, along with art and other projects created by students.
